verses.content: Zânah ka khum chungah ka thlain a hmangai chu ka zawng a, Ama chu ka zawng a, anachu ka hmu nawh a.
“Tuhin tho ka ta, khawpui chu fang vêl ka ta, Kawtthlêrhaia le lamlienhaia chun, Ka thlain a hmangai chu zawng ka tih” ka tih a. Ama chu ka zawng a, ka hmu nawh a.
Vêngtu khawpui fang vêltuhai chun an mi hmuh a, An kuoma chun, “Ka thlain a hmangai kha in lo hmu am?” ka tih a.
Anni ka fe khêl hnung sâwt nawtêah, Ka thlain a hmangai chu ka hmuh a. Ama chu ka chel a, kân fetir ta nawh a; Ka nu inah ka hung ṭhuoi a, Kei a mi neitunu pindana ka hung ṭhuoi lût hmakhat chun.
Aw Jerusalem naunuhai, ka ngên cheu, Phûla sazukpuihai le sakhihaiin, Ka hmangai chu sukṭhangin suktho naw ro, Ama a nuom hmakhat chun.
Meikhu intung lui lui anga Thlalêra inthawka hung suok a, Dâwrkai paudâr po po le, Beraw le murraa innâl riminhnik hi tu am a na?
En ta, a khum hi, Solomon ta hi, Mi thilthawtheitak sâwmrukin an inhuol a, Israel mi hrât khawkhênghai chun.
Kâwlhnâm an chawi seng a, indonaa thiemsa an nih; Mi tin chun an kâwlhnâm chu an êlpui chungah an pai seng a, Zâna ṭitna lei chun.
Lal Solomon chun inzâwnna khum a siem a, Lebanon thingin.
A banhai chu tangkaruoin a siem a, A ṭuong rângkachakin, a ṭhungna a dumpâwlin, A sûngril tieng chu hmangaina le rem a na, Jerusalem nauhaiin.
Aw nangni Zion naunuhai, fe suok unla, lal Solomon chu en ro, Nuhmei a nei nia le a lungril a hlim nia a nuin lallukhum ân khumtir kha.
